G

generateNewSantaClausInstance() - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Method that generates a new instance of the class Santa Claus; Santa Claus must get the number of kids (calculated trough the use of the private method calculateTotalNumberOfGifts() as each kid will get one gift) and the concurrent queue trough which he communicates with the reindeer; a new Santa Claus with these properties is returned
generateReindeer(int, ToyFactory) - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Method that generates a reindeer with a given index and an assigned factory to communicate with in order to get gifts and to pack them
generateToyFactory(int) - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Method that generates a toy factory with a given index and a random grid size
getAssignedFactory() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Getter method for elf assigned factory
getAssignedFactory() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Getter for the assigned factory to work in
getChristmasGiftPipe() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Getter for the pipe that connects it to Santa's work room
getChristmasGiftPipe() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
Getter method for the pipe shared by reindeer and Santa
getChristmasGiftPipe() - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Getter method for the christmas gift pipe (concurrent queue between Santa Claus and reindeer)
getCurrentGift() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Getter for current gift; if the reindeer has not taken one yet from the factory, an error will indicate this situation; if everything goes well, it returns the current gift being processed
getCurrentGiftBeingProcessed() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
Getter method for the current gift that is being processed by Santa; if no gift has been taken yet from the pipe, an error message is printed and null is returned
getCurrentPosition() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Getter method for the elf's current position on the grid matrix, in the toy factory

Getter method for the list of all Christmas gifts
getListOfAvailableMovingPositions(Position2D) - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Method that returns a list of the available moving positions for an elf; we firstly generate all cardinal points from the current elf position; then, for each of them, we test if it is on the grid surface and if it is occupied by another elf or not; if a position is valid in both of the above checks, a string with the direction is saved in the array list;

getNumberOfGifts() - Static method in class cds.java.project.gift.ChristmasGift
Getter method for the static member numberOfGifts that return the number of ChristmasGift instances made so far
getNumberOfKids() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus

getNumberOfWorkingElves() - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Getter method that returns the number of elves that are working in the factory at the moment of call
getPositionDown() - Method in class cds.java.project.position.Position2D
Method that generates a new Position2D object starting from the current form of the current one; it gets the position in south of the current one by subtracting one from the Y coordinate finally, it returns a new Position2D object containing the modified values
getPositionLeft() - Method in class cds.java.project.position.Position2D
Method that generates a new Position2D object starting from the current form of the current one; it gets the position in west of the current one by subtracting one from the X coordinate finally, it returns a new Position2D object containing the modified values
getPositionRight() - Method in class cds.java.project.position.Position2D
Method that generates a new Position2D object starting from the current form of the current one; it gets the position in east of the current one by adding one to the X coordinate finally, it returns a new Position2D object containing the modified values
getPositionUp() - Method in class cds.java.project.position.Position2D
Method that generates a new Position2D object starting from the current form of the current one; it gets the position in north of the current one by adding one to the Y coordinate finally, it returns a new Position2D object containing the modified values

Getter method for the X coordinate
getPositionY() - Method in class cds.java.project.position.Position2D
Getter method for the Y coordinate
getQueueValues() - Method in class cds.java.project.concurrent.ConcurrentQueue
A getter method that returns the inner queue used in order to modelate the ConcurrentQueue class

getServiceThreadSemaphore() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Getter for the binary semphore shared by both reindeer and the service thread

getServiceThreadSemaphore() - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Getter method for the binary semaphore that synchronizes the access to the gifts in the factory when the service thread is performing a query

giftIndex - Variable in class cds.java.project.gift.ChristmasGift
Index of the christmas gift
giftQueue - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Concurrent queue that holds all the presents that have been created by elves; this is the place from which reindeer take afterwards the presents and pack them
gridLock - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
A reentrant lock that blocks the access to the grid when moving an elf in order to avoid synchronization problems
gridMatrix - Variable in class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleBooleanGrid
Boolean matrix that has a value of true in the position [x][y] if there is currently an elf in the position (x, y); false otherwise
gridMatrix - Variable in class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleGrid
Template underlying matrix that represents the actual grid
